slides.headline: Gemini 3 Flash: frontier intelligence built for speed
slides.quote_text: On SWE-bench Verified, a benchmark for evaluating coding agent capabilities, Gemini 3 Flash achieves a score of 78%, outperforming not only the 2.

slides.headline: Tweet by ARC Prize (@arcprize)
slides.quote_text: Competitive performance at a substantially lower cost than other frontier models
slides.attribution: The author's summary of how Gemini 3 Flash compares to its market competitors.

slides.headline: Tweet by Logan Kilpatrick (@OfficialLoganK)
slides.quote_text: Introducing Gemini 3 Flash, our frontier intelligence model, available at scale for everyone.
slides.attribution: The primary announcement of the model's release and availability.

slides.headline: Evaluating AI's ability to perform scientific research tasks
slides.quote_text: The most important benchmark for the scientific capabilities of AI is the novel discoveries it helps generate
slides.attribution: The author notes that while FrontierScience is a critical metric, the ultimate value of AI lies in its real-world scientific output.

slides.headline: Exclusive | Meta Is Developing a New AI...
slides.quote_text: Meta Platforms... is developing a new image and video-focused AI model code-named Mango alongside the company's next text-based large language model.
slides.attribution: Description of the dual-track development of Meta's next-generation AI models.

slides.headline: Gemini 3 Flash for Enterprises | Google Cloud...
slides.quote_text: Gemini 3 Flash shows a relative improvement of 15% in overall accuracy compared to Gemini 2.5 Flash, delivering breakthrough precision on our hardest extraction tasks.
slides.attribution: Yashodha Bhavnani, Head of AI at Box, discussing the model's performance on complex financial data and contracts.

slides.headline: Gemini 3 Flash is now available in Gemini...
slides.quote_text: Gemini 3 Flash achieves a SWE-bench Verified score of 78% for agentic coding, outperforming not only the 2.5 series, but also Gemini 3 Pro.
slides.attribution: Benchmarking data showing the model's unexpected lead over the Pro version in specific coding metrics.

slides.headline: Gemini 3 Pro: the frontier of vision AI
slides.quote_text: Gemini 3 Pro represents a generational leap from simple recognition to true visual and spatial reasoning.
slides.attribution: The author's primary claim regarding the model's advancement over previous iterations.

slides.headline: Introducing GPT-5.2-Codex
slides.quote_text: GPT-5.2-Codex is now better at long-context understanding, reliable tool calling, improved factuality, and native compaction
slides.attribution: Description of the technical improvements over previous iterations like GPT-5.1-Codex-Max.

slides.headline: Update to GPT-5 System Card: GPT-5.2
slides.quote_text: The comprehensive safety mitigation approach for these models is largely the same as that described in the GPT-5 System Card
slides.attribution: Confirms that safety protocols have not undergone a radical shift for this specific update, relying on previously documented methods.

slides.headline: ChatGPT's GPT-5.2 is here, and it feels rushed
slides.quote_text: less like a breakthrough and more like OpenAI holding its ground
slides.attribution: The author's concluding assessment of GPT-5.2's impact on the current AI landscape.
